trans-unit.source: Install or upgrade outsystems-pipeline to the latest available version as follows:
trans-unit.target: Instale o actualice su sistema de tuberías a la última versión disponible de la siguiente manera:

trans-unit.source: Python package to accelerate the integration of OutSystems with third-party CI/CD tools
trans-unit.target: Paquete Python para acelerar la integración de OutSystems con herramientas de CI/CD de terceros

trans-unit.source: The outsystems-pipeline Python package provides functions to support the creation of OutSystems CI/CD pipelines using your DevOps automation tool of choice.
trans-unit.target: El paquete OutSystems-pipeline Python proporciona funciones para apoyar la creación de tuberías CI/CD OutSystems utilizando la herramienta de automatización DevOps de su elección.

trans-unit.source: To deploy OutSystems Applications to a target environment without using the Deployment API.
trans-unit.target: Desplegar las aplicaciones de OutSystems en un entorno de destino sin utilizar la API de despliegue.

trans-unit.source: Used to promote the same application versions throughout the pipeline execution.
trans-unit.target: Se utiliza para promover las mismas versiones de la aplicación a lo largo de la ejecución del oleoducto.

trans-unit.source: Visit the project repository on GitHub for instructions on how to build example OutSystems CI/CD pipelines with common DevOps automation tools, as well as documentation that will help you adapt the examples to your particular scenarios.
trans-unit.target: Visit the project repository on GitHub for instructions on how to build example OutSystems CI/CD pipelines with common DevOps automation tools, as well as documentation that will help you adapt the examples to your particular scenarios.
